meanings.sent1: The cygnets followed their mother across the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of cygnets swimming gracefully in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cygnets played hide and seek with the other birds.
meanings.sent4: The cygnets' white feathers gleamed in the sunlight like little clouds.
meanings.sent5: Watching the cygnets glide on the water was a peaceful sight.

meanings.sent1: The cygnets hatched from their eggs in the nest.
meanings.sent2: The mother swan protected her cygnets from predators.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy cygnets waddled clumsily on the shore.
meanings.sent4: The cygnets' downy feathers were as soft as a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The tiny cygnets chirped softly as they followed their parent.
